course_title: Computer Programming for Engineers Using MATLAB

sections.instructor: Khandani, Seyyed, Prerequisite: MATH-192 or equivalent Advisory: MATH-193 (may be taken concurrently) or equivalent Note: Partially online course. In addition to online instruction, this class has required on ground weekly meetings on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9:35-11:00am for labs and exams. Lecture and other activities will be provided asynchronously via the internet through the college learning management system CANVAS and Zoom software. Access to a computer with a webcam and a microphone is required. Go to www.dvc.edu/online for course access information. This course may use online exam proctoring software to administer exams.
